title: The Elevator
description: Aria Ramdeen is learning to love herself â€” and her favourite foods again. No guilt, no toxic boyfriend.Rob Anderson is recently divorced, and living life as a single guy, while tending to the scars from his marriage.Both live in the same condo building where they've crossed paths in the elevator many times. But neither has had the courage to connect.Then one day, they match on a dating app. But are they ready to meet? Set in the Toronto, The Elevator is an entertaining modern story of two people from different backgrounds who are on a journey of self discovery after failed relationships. The Elevator teaches us what it means to love oneself. Content Warning: eating disorders, body image, discrimination
author: Priya Ramsingh
